mapper.sql: POSITIONID, FIRMID, POSITION, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, POSITION_PRICE, POSITION_UNIT, REDUCTION_NUM, REDUCTION_DATE
mapper.update: update IPO_POSITION set FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYNAME = #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_PRICE = #{positionPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, POSITION_UNIT = #{positionUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REDUCTION_NUM = #{reductionNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REDUCTION_DATE = #{reductionDate,jdbcType=DATE} where POSITIONID = #{positionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select POSITIONID, FIRMID, POSITION, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, POSITION_PRICE, POSITION_UNIT, REDUCTION_NUM, REDUCTION_DATE from IPO_POSITION where POSITIONID = #{positionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select POSITIONID, FIRMID, POSITION, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, POSITION_PRICE, POSITION_UNIT, REDUCTION_NUM, REDUCTION_DATE from IPO_POSITION

select p.commodityid,p.commodityname,p.position,wm_concat(w.warehousename) as warehousename,wm_concat(w.warehouseid) as warehouseid from ipo_position p left join ipo_trusteeship_warehouse t on p.commodityid = t.commodity_id left join bi_warehouse w on w.id = t.warehouse_id where FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by p.commodityid,p.commodityname,p.position
